ComicInfo.Summary:
Various short satires of pop culture.
Plot outlines for tv shows based on advertising characters.
Bad campaign slogans for Hillary's presidential campaign.
Things that could go wrong for zombies, or because of them.
A collection of comic strips including Pondering The Really Meaningful Stuff...; The Long And Short Of It; Elf Droppings; Jump Cut; Father Flannity's Hot Tub Confessions; Product Placement In Horror Movies; Just Below The Surface.
A boy discovers his teacher is not into teacher-student relationships.
Improbable arguments for not controlling guns.
Problems that zombies would run into if they tried to live normal lives.
In the first strip, the Black Spy tries to get into a White facility using a lifted fingerprint from the White Spy, but is clobbered anyway. In the second strip, the White Spy is done in by a fake guillotine.
Goofy ideas of what school bus drivers do in their downtime.
What can happen when the schools remove restroom stall doors.
The show bumbles along at its usual slow pace until Bob Barker shows up and closes it down.
